meanings.definition: To enjoy or appreciate something deeply
meanings.sent1: She savored the delicious chocolate cake slowly, savoring every bite.
meanings.sent2: The family savored the beautiful sunset together, appreciating the colors in the sky.
meanings.sent3: As she savored the victory, she couldn't help but smile with joy.
meanings.sent4: The memories of her childhood savored like sweet honey on her tongue.
meanings.sent5: He savored the music, letting each note fill his heart with happiness.

meanings.definition: To taste or smell something with pleasure
meanings.sent1: The chef savored the soup to ensure it was seasoned perfectly.
meanings.sent2: She savored the aroma of freshly baked bread wafting from the bakery.
meanings.sent3: The cat savored the scent of catnip, rolling around in delight.
meanings.sent4: The wine connoisseur savored the aged wine, noting its complex flavors.
meanings.sent5: He savored the fragrance of the flowers, taking in their sweet perfume.
